00010 #include "filebuildersdelegate.h"

00012 #include <QIcon>
00013 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00015 #include <QHeaderView>

00017 FileBuildersEditor::FileBuildersEditor(void* dataPointer, 
00018                                                                            QWidget *parent):
00019 QWidget(parent),
00020 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00021 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00022 view_(this), model_(dataPointer, this), 
00023 proxy_(this){
00024 
00025         // set view to be sortable
00026         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00027         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00028         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00029         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00030         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00031         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00032         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00033         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00034 
00035         // set the width for columns
00036         view_.horizontalHeader()->setMinimumSectionSize(180);
00037 
00038         view_.setItemDelegate(new FileBuildersDelegate(this));
00039 
00040         // set source model for proxy
00041         proxy_.setSourceModel(&model_);
00042         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00043         view_.setModel(&proxy_);
00044 
00045         // sort the view
00046         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00047 
00048         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00049         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00050         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00051         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00052 
00053         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00054         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00055         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00056         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00057 
00058         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00059                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00061                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062 
00063         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00064                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00065         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00066                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00068                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00070                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00071 
00072         restoreChanges();
00073 }

00076 }

00078 bool FileBuildersEditor::isValid() const {
00079         return model_.isValid();
00080 }
00081 
00082 void FileBuildersEditor::restoreChanges() {
00083         model_.restore();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void FileBuildersEditor::applyChanges() {
00087         model_.apply();
00088 }
00089 
00090 void FileBuildersEditor::onRemove() {
00091         QModelIndex index = proxy_.mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00092 
00093         // if index is valid then remove the row
00094         if (index.isValid())
00095                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00096 }
